speaker: President.
english: President. – The next item is the report by John Bowis, on behalf of the Committee on the Environment, Public Health and Food Safety, on improving the mental health of the population – towards a strategy on mental health for the European Union ( 2006/2058(INI) ( A6-0249/2006 ).
original: President. – The next item is the report by John Bowis, on behalf of the Committee on the Environment, Public Health and Food Safety, on improving the mental health of the population – towards a strategy on mental health for the European Union ( 2006/2058(INI) ( A6-0249/2006 ).
agenda_item: Improving the mental health of the population towards a strategy on mental health for the EU (debate)
